name: patbox
0:
”Alexa, how is my team doing in pat box?”
”Alexa, ask pat box what place am I in.”
”Alexa, is anyone on my team injured in pat box?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pat box
Developer Terms of Use
des: patbox is a Fantasy Football website, and the patbox Alexa skill is a companion to that experience. Link your patbox account and get score updates, team ranking, game times, weekly opponents, and more using Alexa. Now there is no excuse to stay in the know regarding your team and your league in patbox!
